title: BEHOLD WHAT MANNER OF LOVE (I John 3:1)
verse: Behold, what manner of love the Father has given unto us.
Behold, what manner of love the Father has given unto us.
That we should be called the sons of God
That we should be called the sons of God
Behold, what manner of love the Father has given unto us.
Behold, what manner of love the Father has given unto us.
